document.full_text: radiation measured at a village 40 km from japan's crippled nuclear plant exceeded a criterion for evacuation, the u.n. nuclear watchdog said on wednesday, the latest sign of widening consequences from the crisis.
document.title: high radiation outside japan exclusion zone: iaea
lines_and_colors: radiation measured at a village 40 km from japan's crippled nuclear plant exceeded a criterion for evacuation, the u.n. nuclear watchdog said on wednesday, the latest sign of widening consequences from the crisis.
